topics.body:
You know what I would like to see in a anime?  Something that combines *ALL* the cliches people complain about put it into one show, mix it with some anarchy, add in some meta and dump a boat load of humor into it and wrap it up all together in a realization that the series was a lot more grim than it let on.

So like start of with something conceptually like Neptunia, add yaoi trap couple, reverse trap couple, trap-reverse trap couple, moe kaiju, futanari, genderswap, hilarious breast physics, a ridiculous title, merchandise before the show starts, futanari moe kaiju, gropping, add in a harem.  Then at the end of the series wrap it all up with a plot arc about how the reason why everyone in the show is so horny, why there's so much fan service and that is because the everyone in the universe realizes that it's the end of the world and nobody wants to die a virgin and that people are only acting that way cause they know they're going to eventually die from the alien invasion.
